channel.title: [508] jake - scape [508] need staff and helpers!
channel.description:
[img]http://img153.imageshack.us/img153/7798/8115267fcef7841m3.jpg[/img] I have changed the source i am doing. I am now using a 508 source (berky base) Positions needed. (If there is a position that you feel is useful and i do not have posted then just warn me before hand and I will see if the position is needed.) Coder - OPEN Coder - OPEN Coder - OPEN Coder - OPEN Beta tester - apocalypsePK Beta tester - OPEN Forum staff - OPEN Forum staff - OPEN Forum staff - OPEN Forum staff - OPEN Forum staff - OPEN Forum staff - OPEN In game staff - julianx13 (MOD) In game staff - OPEN In game staff - OPEN In game staff - OPEN Other - julianx13 (Advertiser) Owner - Jake Co-owner - J44314 (Jake) Contact me on the forums.
Jake-scape application Name: MSN: Experience: Time Zone: Why I am interested: What position I am interested in:
Pics: [img]http://i903.photobucket.com/albums/ac238/flamezpkz/Home.jpg[/img] [img]http://i903.photobucket.com/albums/ac238/flamezpkz/skillcapeemotes.jpg[/img] Changing outfit interface. [img]http://i903.photobucket.com/albums/ac238/flamezpkz/outfitinterface.jpg[/img] Changing hair interface [img]http://i903.photobucket.com/albums/ac238/flamezpkz/hairinterface.jpg[/img] [img]http://i903.photobucket.com/albums/ac238/flamezpkz/easy.jpg[/img] Range and Mage skills need some working on, but other than that the rest work! [img]http://i903.photobucket.com/albums/ac238/flamezpkz/Allskils.jpg[/img] This is just a brief description of the server. It has everything berky-scape including the bugs and glitches :/ I changed home, the starter, NPC chat, drops, rewards, and NPC hits. As i said i am not a really good coder so you will have to forgive me that is why a lot of positions are open. pm me on the forums if you need to talk Thank you scape-java for directing me in the right directions lawl. :] Contact me at - jaccob.ramsey84@gmail.com

item.title: [508] jake - scape [508] need staff and helpers!
item.dc:creator: @R_A_R_E_S R A R E S
item.description:
@R_A_R_E_S wrote:

[quote=“julianx13, post:14, topic:362367”]Jake-scape application
I know this my sound dumb but hey iim giving it a try
msn: juliancuban@hotmail.com
team view yes

Name:Julian A Velazquez
Experience:3-4 years
Time Zone:eastern time
Why I am interested:Because i can do alot for the game for some reason im good at getting alot of donators im active 24/7 because im done with highschool so ill be taking a year off of college to enjoy and have fun and ill be working with my uncle time to time be ill still be on like i said you’ll barely never see me off. also im good at advertising got like 20-30 people on xbox live that like rsps lol so i can always do what you like me to do.
What position I am interested in: In game staff mod/admin your decision
i think id be good for it because i dont abuse the power and even if im mod or admin id still think im a regular player because i love playing the game and i love pking so youll always see me pking lol and just having fun.[/quote]

I was actually hoping someone would send an application like this for advert and shit so yea man I’m gonna have to say your in. :]

Read full topic

i think id be good for it because i dont abuse the power and even if im mod or admin id still think im a regular player because i love playing the game and i love pking so youll always see me pking lol and just having fun.

Application:Beta Tester/Forum Staff/ingame
Name:John/Johnny
Experience:rsps-3 years all in all rs-5 years
Time Zone:Eastern Time
Why I am interested: Mm i feel that i wanna get back into rsps and stuff so i wanna help out people, and help make what should be one of the best projects i can feel it no lie here.
What position I am interested in:Beta Tester or Forum staff/ingame doesnt matter( ill do what ever)

Ohh my email is apocalypsePK@hotmail.com if u wanna talk on there 2

Alright your in
[/quote]Wait… you let him in? Read his sig…

What did his sig say lawl?
[/quote]Talking about being inactive, but he told me that that was like 2 months ago, so never mind.[/quote]

Oh ok thanks man. hahahaha!
